name: 2-Player Penformer
description:
On Scratch: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/458109433/

Play this game with a friend. Travel through 10 different levels with obstacles to pass. Have fun!

P1 (red) Controls: [W] to jump, [A] and [D] to move

P2 (blue) Controls: Arrow keys

I may add more levels in the future, so follow me for notifications!
